contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{Politics of Azerbaijan}} The '''Virtue Party''' ({{lang-az|Fəzilət Partiyası}}) is a [[political party]] of [[Azerbaijan]]. Its founding congress was held 20 June 2005. [[Gündüz Hacıyev]] is chairman of the party, which already claims some 2,000 members. Among other things, it stands for the restoration of Azeri control over the contested [[Nagorno-Karabakh]] region. {{Azerbaijani political parties}} [[Category:Political parties in Azerbaijan]] [[Category:Political parties established in 2005]] [[Category:2005 establishments in Azerbaijan]] {{Azerbaijan-party-stub}}
